section.name: Overview
section.p: The Merlin platform includes a set of developer tools that assist in the automation of different process contributing to reliable and consistant component development. These tools include an ant task supporting meta info generation for component types and services, and an equivalent Maven plugin.

tr.td: The Merlin plugin for Maven that provides support for meta infor generation when building with the Maven tool.
